project.name: Spinframework
project.description:
Spinframework is an OSS organization that includes two CNCF projects, Spin (see also its GitHub repo) and SpinKube.  Both are currently in CNCF Sandbox status.

Spin is a framework for building and running event-driven microservice applications with WebAssembly (Wasm) components.

SpinKube is an open source, Kubernetes native project that streamlines developing, deploying, and operating WebAssembly (Wasm) workloads in Kubernetes.
